0.text: Innate - Human Form: Elise gains one dormant Spiderling whenever she hits an enemy with an ability, storing up to 2 / 3 / 4 / 5 (based on  Human Form's Rank).

1.text: Innate - Spider Form: Elise's basic attacks deal 10 / 20 / 30 / 40 (based on  Spider Form's Rank) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage and  heal her for 4 / 6 / 8 / 10 (based on  Spider Form's Rank) (+ 10% AP) on-hit.

0.text: Active: Elise fires toxin at the target enemy, dealing them magic damage upon its arrival, capped against  monsters.

origin: 40 / 70 / 100 / 130 / 160 (+ 4% (+ 3% per 100 ap) of target's current health)

scalingPartType: % per 100 ap of target's current health

0.text: Active: Elise summons an  untargetable venom-gorged spider for 3 seconds, which crawls to the target location and navigates its path upon encountering terrain.

1.text: The spider explodes upon contact with an enemy or at the end of its lifespan, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

2.text: If the spider does not hit an enemy before reaching the target location, it chases down a nearby enemy, prioritizing  champions. The spider gains  bonus movement speed based on its proximity to its target.

0.text: Active: Elise fires a web in the target direction,  stunning the first enemy hit for a few seconds, during which they are also  revealed.
Active: Elise  pounces at the target enemy with her fangs and bites them, dealing them magic damage, capped against  monsters, and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

origin: 70 / 105 / 140 / 175 / 210 (+ 8% (+ 3% per 100 ap) of target's missing health)

scalingPartType: % per 100 ap of target's missing health

1.text: If there are active  Spiderlings or  Volatile Spiderlings nearby, they will  dash alongside Elise towards Venomous Bite's target and reprioritize them.

0.text: Passive: Elise's  Spiderlings gain  bonus attack speed.

1.text: Active: Elise and her  Spiderlings gain  bonus attack speed for 3 seconds.

2.text: Skittering Frenzy  resets Elise's basic attack timer.

3.text: Elise loses Skittering Frenzy immediately when she switches to  Human Form.

0.text: Active: Elise and her  Spiderlings lift up into the air,  vanishing and becoming  unable to act for up to 2 seconds and granting  sight of the area for the duration.

1.text: Rappel can be recast on a target enemy within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration without a target.

2.text: Recast: Elise and her  Spiderlings instantly  descend upon the target, or their current position if there is no target.

3.text: If cast directly on an enemy, Elise and her  Spiderlings automatically recast on the target after 1 second. Upon landing this way,  Spider Queen's bonuses are increased for 5 seconds.

4.text: Rappel's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

0.text: Passive:  Spider Queen's bonuses are increased.

1.text: Toggle: Elise switches between her  Human Form and  Spider Form.

2.text: Spider Form: Elise transforms into a menacing spider, gaining  25 bonus movement speed,  melee basic attacks with 125  range, and access to her arachnid abilities. Additionally, Elise unleashes all stored Spiderlings.

3.text: Human Form: Elise transforms into her human form, gaining  ranged basic attacks, and access to her human abilities. Additionally, Elise stores all unleashed Spiderlings.

4.text: Elise begins with one rank in Spider Form / Human Form and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.

origin: 40 / 70 / 100 / 130 / 160 (+ 4% (+ 3% per 100 ap) of target's current health)

scalingPartType: % per 100 ap of target's current health

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Soulrend: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending upon damaging new champions (40 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SOULREND: Damaging an enemy champion deals 125 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage and grants you 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds, with the duration extending upon damaging new champions (40 (per champion) second cooldown).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – STASIS: Put yourself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you  untargetable and  invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
